1password.description: 1Password is a password manager that allows you to store and manage your passwords securely.

anydesk.description: AnyDesk is a remote desktop software that enables users to access and control computers remotely. It is known for its fast connection and low latency.

autoruns.description: This utility shows you what programs are configured to run during system bootup or login

starship.description: Starship is a minimal, fast, and customizable prompt for any shell.

steam.description: Steam is a digital distribution platform for purchasing and playing video games, offering multiplayer gaming, video streaming, and more.

strawberry.description: Strawberry is an open-source music player that focuses on music collection management and audio quality. It supports various audio formats and features a clean user interface.

stremio.description: Stremio is a media center application that allows users to organize and stream their favorite movies, TV shows, and video content.

sublimemerge.description: Sublime Merge is a Git client with advanced features and a beautiful interface.

sublimetext.description: Sublime Text is a sophisticated text editor for code, markup, and prose.

sumatra.description: Sumatra PDF is a lightweight and fast PDF viewer with minimalistic design.

pdfgear.description: PDFgear is a piece of full-featured PDF management software for Windows, Mac, and mobile, and it's completely free to use.

sunshine.description: Sunshine is a GameStream server that allows you to remotely play PC games on Android devices, offering low-latency streaming.

superf4.description: SuperF4 is a utility that allows you to terminate programs instantly by pressing a customizable hotkey.

swift.description: Swift is a general-purpose programming language that's approachable for newcomers and powerful for experts.

synctrayzor.description: Windows tray utility / filesystem watcher / launcher for Syncthing

sqlmanagementstudio.description: SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) is an integrated environment for managing any SQL infrastructure, from SQL Server to Azure SQL Database. SSMS provides tools to configure, monitor, and administer instances of SQL Server and databases.

tabby.description: Tabby is a highly configurable terminal emulator, SSH and serial client for Windows, macOS and Linux

tailscale.description: Tailscale is a secure and easy-to-use VPN solution for connecting your devices and networks.

TcNoAccSwitcher.description: A Super-fast account switcher for Steam, Battle.net, Epic Games, Origin, Riot, Ubisoft and many others!

tcpview.description: SysInternals TCPView is a network monitoring tool that displays a detailed list of all TCP and UDP endpoints on your system.

teams.description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that integrates with Office 365 and offers chat, video conferencing, file sharing, and more.

teamviewer.description: TeamViewer is a popular remote access and support software that allows you to connect to and control remote devices.

telegram.description: Telegram is a cloud-based instant messaging app known for its security features, speed, and simplicity.

terminal.description: Windows Terminal is a modern, fast, and efficient terminal application for command-line users, supporting multiple tabs, panes, and more.

MuEditor.description: Mu is a Python code editor for beginner programmers

thorium.description: Browser built for speed over vanilla chromium. It is built with AVX2 optimizations and is the fastest browser on the market.

thunderbird.description: Mozilla Thunderbird is a free and open-source email client, news client, and chat client with advanced features.

betterbird.description: Betterbird is a fork of Mozilla Thunderbird with additional features and bugfixes.

tidal.description: Tidal is a music streaming service known for its high-fidelity audio quality and exclusive content. It offers a vast library of songs and curated playlists.

tor.description: Tor Browser is designed for anonymous web browsing, utilizing the Tor network to protect user privacy and security.

totalcommander.description: Total Commander is a file manager for Windows that provides a powerful and intuitive interface for file management.

treesize.description: TreeSize Free is a disk space manager that helps you analyze and visualize the space usage on your drives.

ttaskbar.description: TranslucentTB is a tool that allows you to customize the transparency of the Windows taskbar.

twinkletray.description: Twinkle Tray lets you easily manage the brightness levels of multiple monitors.

ubisoft.description: Ubisoft Connect is Ubisoft's digital distribution and online gaming service, providing access to Ubisoft's games and services.

ungoogled.description: Ungoogled Chromium is a version of Chromium without Google's integration for enhanced privacy and control.

unity.description: Unity is a powerful game development platform for creating 2D, 3D, augmented reality, and virtual reality games.

vagrant.description: Vagrant is an open-source tool for building and managing virtualized development environments.

vc2015_32.description: Visual C++ 2015-2022 32-bit redistributable package installs runtime components of Visual C++ libraries required to run 32-bit applications.

vc2015_64.description: Visual C++ 2015-2022 64-bit redistributable package installs runtime components of Visual C++ libraries required to run 64-bit applications.

ventoy.description: Ventoy is an open-source tool for creating bootable USB drives. It supports multiple ISO files on a single USB drive, making it a versatile solution for installing operating systems.

vesktop.description: A cross platform electron-based desktop app aiming to give you a snappier Discord experience with Vencord pre-installed.

viber.description: Viber is a free messaging and calling app with features like group chats, video calls, and more.

videomass.description: Videomass by GianlucaPernigotto is a cross-platform GUI for FFmpeg, streamlining multimedia file processing with batch conversions and user-friendly features.

visualstudio.description: Visual Studio 2022 is an integrated development environment (IDE) for building, debugging, and deploying applications.

vivaldi.description: Vivaldi is a highly customizable web browser with a focus on user personalization and productivity features.

vlc.description: VLC Media Player is a free and open-source multimedia player that supports a wide range of audio and video formats. It is known for its versatility and cross-platform compatibility.

voicemeeter.description: Voicemeeter is a virtual audio mixer that allows you to manage and enhance audio streams on your computer. It is commonly used for audio recording and streaming purposes.

VoicemeeterPotato.description: Voicemeeter Potato is the ultimate version of the Voicemeeter Audio Mixer Application endowed with Virtual Audio Device to mix and manage any audio sources from or to any audio devices or applications.

vrdesktopstreamer.description: Virtual Desktop Streamer is a tool that allows you to stream your desktop screen to VR devices.

vscode.description: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor with support for multiple programming languages.

vscodium.description: VSCodium is a community-driven, freely-licensed binary distribution of Microsoft's VS Code.

waterfox.description: Waterfox is a fast, privacy-focused web browser based on Firefox, designed to preserve user choice and privacy.

wazuh.description: Wazuh is an open-source security monitoring platform that offers intrusion detection, compliance checks, and log analysis.

wezterm.description: WezTerm is a powerful cross-platform terminal emulator and multiplexer

windowspchealth.description: Windows PC Health Check is a tool that helps you check if your PC meets the system requirements for Windows 11.

WindowGrid.description: WindowGrid is a modern window management program for Windows that allows the user to quickly and easily layout their windows on a dynamic grid using just the mouse.

wingetui.description: UniGetUI is a GUI for Winget, Chocolatey, and other Windows CLI package managers.

winmerge.description: WinMerge is a visual text file and directory comparison tool for Windows.

winpaletter.description: WinPaletter is a tool for adjusting the color palette of Windows 10, providing customization options for window colors.

winrar.description: WinRAR is a powerful archive manager that allows you to create, manage, and extract compressed files.

winscp.description: WinSCP is a popular open-source SFTP, FTP, and SCP client for Windows. It allows secure file transfers between a local and a remote computer.

wireguard.description: WireGuard is a fast and modern VPN (Virtual Private Network) protocol. It aims to be simpler and more efficient than other VPN protocols, providing secure and reliable connections.

wireshark.description: Wireshark is a widely-used open-source network protocol analyzer. It allows users to capture and analyze network traffic in real-time, providing detailed insights into network activities.

wisetoys.description: WiseToys is a set of utilities and tools designed to enhance and optimize your Windows experience.

TeraCopy.description: Copy your files faster and more securely

wizfile.description: Find files by name on your hard drives almost instantly.

wiztree.description: WizTree is a fast disk space analyzer that helps you quickly find the files and folders consuming the most space on your hard drive.

xdm.description: Xtreme Download Manager is an advanced download manager with support for various protocols and browsers.*Browser integration deprecated by google store. No official release.*

xeheditor.description: HxD is a free hex editor that allows you to edit, view, search, and analyze binary files.

xemu.description: XEMU is an open-source Xbox emulator that allows you to play Xbox games on your PC, aiming for accuracy and compatibility.

xnview.description: XnView is an efficient image viewer, browser and converter for Windows.

xournal.description: Xournal++ is an open-source handwriting notetaking software with PDF annotation capabilities.

xpipe.description: XPipe is an open-source tool for orchestrating containerized applications. It simplifies the deployment and management of containerized services in a distributed environment.

yarn.description: Yarn is a fast, reliable, and secure dependency management tool for JavaScript projects.

ytdlp.description: Command-line tool that allows you to download videos from YouTube and other supported sites. It is an improved version of the popular youtube-dl.

zerotierone.description: ZeroTier One is a software-defined networking tool that allows you to create secure and scalable networks.

zim.description: Zim Desktop Wiki is a graphical text editor used to maintain a collection of wiki pages.

zoom.description: Zoom is a popular video conferencing and web conferencing service for online meetings, webinars, and collaborative projects.

zoomit.description: A screen zoom, annotation, and recording tool for technical presentations and demos

zotero.description: Zotero is a free, easy-to-use tool to help you collect, organize, cite, and share your research materials.

zoxide.description: Zoxide is a fast and efficient directory changer (cd) that helps you navigate your file system with ease.

zulip.description: Zulip is an open-source team collaboration tool with chat streams for productive and organized communication.

syncthingtray.description: Might be the alternative for Synctrayzor. Windows tray utility / filesystem watcher / launcher for Syncthing

miniconda.description: Miniconda is a free minimal installer for conda. It is a small bootstrap version of Anaconda that includes only conda, Python, the packages they both depend on, and a small number of other useful packages (like pip, zlib, and a few others).

pixi.description: Pixi is a fast software package manager built on top of the existing conda ecosystem. Spins up development environments quickly on Windows, macOS and Linux. Pixi supports Python, R, C/C++, Rust, Ruby, and many other languages.

temurin.description: Eclipse Temurin is the open source Java SE build based upon OpenJDK.

intelpresentmon.description: A new gaming performance overlay and telemetry application to monitor and measure your gaming experience.

pyenvwin.description: pyenv for Windows is a simple python version management tool. It lets you easily switch between multiple versions of Python.

tightvnc.description: TightVNC is a free and Open Source remote desktop software that lets you access and control a computer over the network. With its intuitive interface, you can interact with the remote screen as if you were sitting in front of it. You can open files, launch applications, and perform other actions on the remote desktop almost as if you were physically there

ultravnc.description: UltraVNC is a powerful, easy to use and free - remote pc access software - that can display the screen of another computer (via internet or network) on your own screen. The program allows you to use your mouse and keyboard to control the other PC remotely. It means that you can work on a remote computer, as if you were sitting in front of it, right from your current location.

windowsfirewallcontrol.description: Windows Firewall Control is a powerful tool which extends the functionality of Windows Firewall and provides new extra features which makes Windows Firewall better.

vistaswitcher.description: VistaSwitcher makes it easier for you to locate windows and switch focus, even on multi-monitor systems. The switcher window consists of an easy-to-read list of all tasks running with clearly shown titles and a full-sized preview of the selected task.

autodarkmode.description: Automatically switches between the dark and light theme of Windows 10 and Windows 11

AmbieWhiteNoise.description: Ambie is the ultimate app to help you focus, study, or relax. We use white noise and nature sounds combined with an innovative focus timer to keep you concentrated on doing your best work.

magicwormhole.description: get things from one computer to another, safely

croc.description: Easily and securely send things from one computer to another.

qgis.description: QGIS (Quantum GIS) is an open-source Geographic Information System (GIS) software that enables users to create, edit, visualize, analyze, and publish geospatial information on Windows, Mac, and Linux platforms.

smplayer.description: SMPlayer is a free media player for Windows and Linux with built-in codecs that can play virtually all video and audio formats.

glazewm.description: GlazeWM is a tiling window manager for Windows inspired by i3 and Polybar

fancontrol.description: Fan Control is a free and open-source software that allows the user to control his CPU, GPU and case fans using temperatures.

fnm.description: Fast Node Manager (fnm) allows you to switch your Node version by using the Terminal

Windhawk.description: The customization marketplace for Windows programs

ForceAutoHDR.description: ForceAutoHDR simplifies the process of adding games to the AutoHDR list in the Windows Registry

JoyToKey.description: enables PC game controllers to emulate the keyboard and mouse input

nditools.description: NDI, or Network Device Interface, is a video connectivity standard that enables multimedia systems to identify and communicate with one another over IP and to encode, transmit, and receive high-quality, low latency, frame-accurate video and audio, and exchange metadata in real-time.

kicad.description: Kicad is an open-source EDA tool. It's a good starting point for those who want to do electrical design and is even used by professionals in the industry.

dropox.description: The Dropbox desktop app! Save hard drive space, share and edit files and send for signature – all without the distraction of countless browser tabs.

OFGB.description: GUI Tool to remove ads from various places around Windows 11

PaleMoon.description: Pale Moon is an Open Source, Goanna-based web browser available for Microsoft Windows and Linux (with other operating systems in development), focusing on efficiency and ease of use.

Shotcut.description: Shotcut is a free, open source, cross-platform video editor.

LenovoLegionToolkit.description: Lenovo Legion Toolkit (LLT) is a open-source utility created for Lenovo Legion (and similar) series laptops, that allows changing a couple of features that are only available in Lenovo Vantage or Legion Zone. It runs no background services, uses less memory, uses virtually no CPU, and contains no telemetry. Just like Lenovo Vantage, this application is Windows only.

Aegisub.description: Aegisub is a free, cross-platform open source tool for creating and modifying subtitles. Aegisub makes it quick and easy to time subtitles to audio, and features many powerful tools for styling them, including a built-in real-time video preview.

SubtitleEdit.description: Subtitle Edit is a free and open source editor for video subtitles.

Fork.description: Fork - a fast and friendly git client.

ZenBrowser.description: The modern, privacy-focused, performance-driven browser built on Firefox

Zed.description: Zed is a modern, high-performance code editor designed from the ground up for speed and collaboration.

LLLVM.description: A collection of modular and reusable compiler and toolchain technologies.

NASM.description: A powerful assembler for the x86 platform.
